resources.string: Hello, this is your Purrfect Phone!

"Help for Purrfect Phone users

 Purrfect Phone version 1.6

Pet your kitty by rubbing the screen. But watch out for kitty's sensitive spot! If you touch it you will make kitty angry.

 You can load a picture of your own kitty from your Android device's external storage (SD card) by selecting 'Choose Pet' from the menu. This will display the contents of your Android device's external storage. Navigate to the image you want to use and select it by tapping the screen. If you have a folder called 'petphone' or 'PetPhone', its contents will be displayed first (saves a little time).

Note: 1. the image you select should be less than 200KB in size.
2. As long as the 'Use default image' option is checked, the default image will be displayed - no matter what image you select with 'Choose pet'.

If you have any suggestions on how to improve this application, email me at 
Will.GreatApps@gmail.com"
To activate an option, check its box. To deactivate an option, uncheck its box. Press the \'Confirm selection\' button to save your choice.
